Title: I Want to Live!
Writer: Nelson Gidding (screenplay), Don Mankiewicz (screenplay), Ed Montgomery (newspaper articles), Barbara Graham (letters)
Actors: Susan Hayward, Simon Oakland, Virginia Vincent, Theodore Bikel
Plot: Barbara Graham is a woman with dubious moral standards, often a guest in seedy bars. She has been sentenced for some petty crimes. Two men she knows murder an older woman. When they get caught they start to think that Barbara has helped the police to arrest them. As a revenge they tell the police that Barbara is the murderer.
